SELECT SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_ID,
KIND, MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, DAYS,
USER_KEY, DATA_NO, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS( SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_ID,
KIND, MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, DAYS,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_ID,
:KIND, :MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, :DAYS,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS SET KIND = :KIND, MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID = :MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, DAYS = :DAYS,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_ID = :SI_REQUIRED_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_ID AND TS = :TS
